Reviews.Title: Good performance
Reviews.Author: Popito
Reviews.Content: I've used it for two weeks and I didn't have any problem. It's fast and has a good performance. Its camera has a good resolution

Reviews.Title: So far so good
Reviews.Author: Handyman Ace
Reviews.Content: I really like this phone so far. I have had nothing but good luck with it so far. I would recommend it to anyone whose looking for a pretty good phone and doesn't want to spend an arm and a leg for quality. Im a basic texter and don't play any games so I wouldn't know how it would do under those conditions. But mine works great to access the internet, make calls and text. Again, so far so good.

Reviews.Title: Very good customer support on this purchase.
Reviews.Author: Dave
Reviews.Content: Due to some misleading descriptions on GSMArena and Amazon I purchased this phone believing  it was a dual sim model. The vendor immediately offered a full refund and corrected the misleading advertising. Since then I purchased the identical "dual sim" S6812 model from BREED and I am very happy with this phone. I will do business with BREED the next time I purchase a phone.
